p.d: International star Katherine Jenkins first UK solo arena tour, celebrating her latest album "Believe" was heralded an outstanding success by fans and critics alike. Filmed at London's O2 Arena, Katherine takes her live performance to a phenomenal new level. This show presents Katherine as singer, dancer, actress and circus performer across a range of music running from virtuoso classical pieces to standards, cabaret and musical theatre. Directed by renowned choreographer Kim Gavin we are invited to enjoy fantastic performances from Katherine plus a troupe of singers, dancers, orchestra and band. This is Katherine Jenkins as you've never seen her before!
